DOC.brief_summary: Cluster headache is a syndrome characterized by disabling headache and accompanying autonomic symptoms. Despite cluster headache is called "suicide headache", its natural history has not been well investigated. We aimed to investigate its disease course, overall prognosis, and treatment pattern in our retrospective cohort.
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Prognosis of Cluster Headache: a Retrospective Cohort Study
DOC.criteria: Patients who were diagnosed as cluster headache More than 5 years after the first visit Subjects who refused the telephone visit
